;************************************************************************************** ;************************************************************************************** ;* ;* NAME: ;* GET_VEGETATION_TIMESERIES_PLOTS ;* ;* PURPOSE: ;* GENERATES PLOTS FROM THE SUPPLIED TIME SERIES OF DIMITRI VEGETATION DATA. ;* ;* CALLING SEQUENCE: ;* RES = GET_VEGETATION_TIMESERIES_PLOTS(OUTPUT_SAV) ;* ;* INPUTS: ;* OUTPUT_SAV - STRING OF THE SENSOR/PROCESSING OUTPUT SAV ;* ;* KEYWORDS: ;* COLOUR_TABLE - USER DEFINED IDL COLOUR TABLE INDEX (DEFAULT IS 39) ;* PLOT_XSIZE - WIDTH OF GENERATED PLOTS (DEFAULT IS 700PX) ;* PLOT_YSIZE - HEIGHT OF GENERATED PLOTS (DEFAULT IS 400PX) ;* NO_ZBUFF - IF SET THEN PLOTS ARE GENERATED IN WINDOWS AND NOT ;* WIHTIN THE Z-BUFFER. ;* VERBOSE - PROCESSING STATUS OUTPUTS ;* ;* OUTPUTS: ;* PLOTS OF TOA REFLECTANCE, REFLECTANCE EVOLUTION, SOLAR ZENITH ANGLE AND SENSOR ;* ZENITH ANGLE AUTOMATICALLY SAVED. ;* ;* COMMON BLOCKS: ;* NONE ;* ;* MODIFICATION HISTORY: ;* 17 DEC 2010 - C KENT - DIMITRI-2 V1.0 ;* 10 JAN 2011 - C KENT - CHANGED INPUT VARIABLE TO SENSOR_L1B_REF ;* 12 JAN 2011 - C KENT - UPDATED TO REFLECT CHANGES IN SENSORS_L1B_REF (INCLUDES VAA AND SAA) ;* 22 MAR 2011 - C KENT - ADDED CONFIGURATION FILE DEPENDENCE ;* 04 JUL 2011 - C KENT - ADDED AUX INFO TO OUTPUT SAV ;* ;* VALIDATION HISTORY: ;* 01 DEC 2010 - C KENT - WINDOWS 32-BIT MACHINE IDL 7.1: COMPILATION SUCCESSFUL, ;* ZBUFFER AND NOMINAL PLOTS PRODUCED OK. ;* 06 JAN 2011 - C KENT - LINUX 64-BIT MACHINE IDL 8.0: COMPILATION SUCCESSFUL, ;* NO APPARENT DIFFERENCES WHEN COMPARED TO WINDOWS MACHINE ;* ;************************************************************************************** ;************************************************************************************** FUNCTION GET_VEGETATION_TIMESERIES_PLOTS,OUTPUT_SAV,NO_ZBUFF=NO_ZBUFF,COLOUR_TABLE=COLOUR_TABLE,PLOT_XSIZE=PLOT_XSIZE,PLOT_YSIZE=PLOT_YSIZE,VERBOSE=VERBOSE ;----------------------------------------------- ; RESTORE THE L1B REFLECTANCE TEMP = FILE_INFO(OUTPUT_SAV) IF TEMP.EXISTS EQ 1 THEN BEGIN RESTORE,OUTPUT_SAV ENDIF ELSE BEGIN PRINT, 'VEGETATION_TIMESERIES_PLOTS: ERROR, OUTPUT_SAV DOES NOT EXIST' RETURN,-1 ENDELSE ;----------------------------------------------- ; FIND ONLY THE GOOD DATA NUM_NON_REFS = 5+12 RES = WHERE(SENSOR_L1B_REF[NUM_NON_REFS,*] GT 0.0 AND SENSOR_L1B_REF[NUM_NON_REFS,*] LT 5.0) IF RES[0] EQ -1 THEN RETURN,-1 VEGETATION_L1B_REF_GD = SENSOR_L1B_REF[*,RES] ;------------------------------------------------ ; GET THE SIZE DIMENSIONS OF INPUT L1B TIMESERIES (NOTE, EXPECTING DIMITRI-VEGETATION VARIABLE STRUCTURE) NB_BANDS = 4 NB_COLS = NUM_NON_REFS+2*(NB_BANDS) RES = SIZE(VEGETATION_L1B_REF_GD) IF RES[1] NE NB_COLS THEN BEGIN PRINT, 'VEGETATION_TIMESERIES_PLOTS: ERROR, INPUT L1B VARIABLE STRUCTURE MUST BE IN DIMITRI FORMAT' RETURN, -1 ENDIF ;------------------------------------------------ ; SET PARAMETERS AND KEYWORD VALUES CFIG_DATA = GET_DIMITRI_CONFIGURATION() IF NOT KEYWORD_SET(COLOUR_TABLE) THEN BEGIN IF KEYWORD_SET(VERBOSE) THEN PRINT, 'VEGETATION_TIMESERIES_PLOTS: NO COLOR_TABLE SET, USING DEFAULT OF 39' COLOUR_TABLE = CFIG_DATA.(1)[2] ENDIF IF NOT KEYWORD_SET(PLOT_XSIZE) THEN BEGIN IF KEYWORD_SET(VERBOSE) THEN PRINT, 'VEGETATION_TIMESERIES_PLOTS: PLOT_XSIZE NOT SET, USING DEFAULT OF 700' PLOT_XSIZE = CFIG_DATA.(1)[0] ENDIF IF NOT KEYWORD_SET(PLOT_YSIZE) THEN BEGIN IF KEYWORD_SET(VERBOSE) THEN PRINT, 'VEGETATION_TIMESERIES_PLOTS: PLOT_YSIZE NOT SET, USING DEFAULT OF 400' PLOT_YSIZE = CFIG_DATA.(1)[1] ENDIF YMIN = 0.0 YMAX = 1.0 ;------------------------------------------------ ; DEFINE OUTPUT FILENAMES BASED ON OUTPUT_SAV OUTPUT_BASE = STRMID(OUTPUT_SAV,0,STRLEN(OUTPUT_SAV)-11) IF KEYWORD_SET(VERBOSE) THEN PRINT, 'VEGETATION_TIMESERIES_PLOTS: OUTPUT_BASE = ',OUTPUT_BASE ;------------------------------------------------ ; SETUP WINDOW PROPERTIES MACHINE_WINDOW = !D.NAME IF NOT KEYWORD_SET(NO_ZBUFF) THEN BEGIN IF KEYWORD_SET(VERBOSE) THEN PRINT, 'VEGETATION_TIMESERIES_PLOTS: GENERATING PLOTS WITHIN Z-BUFFER' SET_PLOT, 'Z' DEVICE, SET_RESOLUTION=[PLOT_XSIZE,PLOT_YSIZE],set_pixel_depth=24 ERASE ENDIF ELSE WINDOW,XSIZE = PLOT_XSIZE,YSIZE=PLOT_YSIZE DEVICE, DECOMPOSED = 0 LOADCT, COLOUR_TABLE ;------------------------------------------------ ; PLOT REFLECTANCE DATA AGAINST DOY IF KEYWORD_SET(VERBOSE) THEN PRINT, 'VEGETATION_TIMESERIES_PLOTS: PLOTTING TOA REFLECTANCE AGAINST DOY' PLOT,VEGETATION_L1B_REF_GD[0,*],VEGETATION_L1B_REF_GD[NUM_NON_REFS,*],/NODATA,$ COLOR = 0, BACKGROUND = 255,$ YTITLE = 'TOA REFLECTANCE (DL)',$ XTITLE = 'DECIMAL YEAR',$ YRANGE = [YMIN,YMAX],$ XTICKFORMAT='((F8.3))' FOR PLOT_BAND=0,NB_BANDS-1 DO BEGIN TT = WHERE(VEGETATION_L1B_REF_GD[NUM_NON_REFS+PLOT_BAND,*] GT 0.0 AND VEGETATION_L1B_REF_GD[NUM_NON_REFS+PLOT_BAND,*] LT 1.0) IF TT[0] GT -1 THEN OPLOT, VEGETATION_L1B_REF_GD[0,TT],VEGETATION_L1B_REF_GD[NUM_NON_REFS+PLOT_BAND,TT],$ COLOR = 250.*PLOT_BAND/FLOAT(NB_BANDS) ENDFOR TEMP = TVRD(TRUE=1) OUTPUT_IMAGE = STRING(OUTPUT_BASE+'TOA_REFLECTANCE.jpg') IF KEYWORD_SET(VERBOSE) THEN PRINT, 'VEGETATION_TIMESERIES_PLOTS: REFLECTANCE OUTPUT AT ',OUTPUT_IMAGE WRITE_JPEG,OUTPUT_IMAGE,TEMP,TRUE=1,QUALITY=100 ERASE ;---------------------------------------------- ;PLOT REFLECTANCE EVOLUTION AGAINST DOY IF KEYWORD_SET(VERBOSE) THEN PRINT, 'VEGETATION_TIMESERIES_PLOTS: PLOTTING TOA REFLECTANCE EVOLUTION AGAINST DOY' PLOT,VEGETATION_L1B_REF_GD[0,*],100.0*(VEGETATION_L1B_REF_GD[NUM_NON_REFS,*]-VEGETATION_L1B_REF_GD[NUM_NON_REFS,0])/VEGETATION_L1B_REF_GD[NUM_NON_REFS,0],/NODATA,$ COLOR = 0, BACKGROUND = 255,$ YTITLE = 'TOA REFLECTANCE EVOLUTION (%)',$ XTITLE = 'DECIMAL YEAR',$ XTICKFORMAT='((F8.3))' FOR PLOT_BAND=0,NB_BANDS-1 DO BEGIN TT = WHERE(VEGETATION_L1B_REF_GD[NUM_NON_REFS+PLOT_BAND,*] GT 0.0 AND VEGETATION_L1B_REF_GD[NUM_NON_REFS+PLOT_BAND,*] LT 1.0) IF TT[0] GT -1 THEN OPLOT, VEGETATION_L1B_REF_GD[0,TT],100.0*(VEGETATION_L1B_REF_GD[NUM_NON_REFS+PLOT_BAND,TT]-VEGETATION_L1B_REF_GD[NUM_NON_REFS+PLOT_BAND,0])/VEGETATION_L1B_REF_GD[NUM_NON_REFS+PLOT_BAND,0],$ COLOR = 250.*PLOT_BAND/FLOAT(NB_BANDS) ENDFOR TEMP = TVRD(/TRUE) OUTPUT_IMAGE = STRING(OUTPUT_BASE+'TOA_EVOLUTION.jpg') IF KEYWORD_SET(VERBOSE) THEN PRINT, 'VEGETATION_TIMESERIES_PLOTS: EVOLUTION OUTPUT AT ',OUTPUT_IMAGE WRITE_JPEG,OUTPUT_IMAGE,TEMP,TRUE=1,QUALITY=100 ERASE ;----------------------------------------------- ; PLOT SENSOR ZENITH AGAINST DOY IF KEYWORD_SET(VERBOSE) THEN PRINT, 'VEGETATION_TIMESERIES_PLOTS: PLOTTING SENSOR ZENITH AGAINST DOY' PLOT,VEGETATION_L1B_REF_GD[0,*],VEGETATION_L1B_REF_GD[1,*],/NODATA,$ COLOR = 0, BACKGROUND = 255,$ YTITLE = 'SENSOR ZENITH OVER ROI (DEGREES)',$ XTITLE = 'DECIMAL YEAR',$ XTICKFORMAT='((F8.3))' OPLOT,VEGETATION_L1B_REF_GD[0,*],VEGETATION_L1B_REF_GD[1,*],$ PSYM = 2,$ COLOR = 250 TEMP = TVRD(/TRUE) OUTPUT_IMAGE = STRING(OUTPUT_BASE+'SENSOR_ZENITH_ANGLE.jpg') IF KEYWORD_SET(VERBOSE) THEN PRINT, 'VEGETATION_TIMESERIES_PLOTS: SENSOR ZENITH OUTPUT AT ',OUTPUT_IMAGE WRITE_JPEG,OUTPUT_IMAGE,TEMP,TRUE=1,QUALITY=100 ERASE ;----------------------------------------------- ; PLOT SOLAR ZENITH AGAINST DOY IF KEYWORD_SET(VERBOSE) THEN PRINT, 'VEGETATION_TIMESERIES_PLOTS: PLOTTING SOLAR ZENITH AGAINST DOY' PLOT,VEGETATION_L1B_REF_GD[0,*],VEGETATION_L1B_REF_GD[3,*],/NODATA,$ COLOR = 0, BACKGROUND = 255,$ YTITLE = 'SOLAR ZENITH OVER ROI (DEGREES)',$ XTITLE = 'DECIMAL YEAR',$ XTICKFORMAT='((F8.3))' OPLOT,VEGETATION_L1B_REF_GD[0,*],VEGETATION_L1B_REF_GD[3,*],$ PSYM = 2,$ COLOR = 70 TEMP = TVRD(/TRUE) OUTPUT_IMAGE = string(OUTPUT_BASE+'SOLAR_ZENITH_ANGLE.jpg') IF KEYWORD_SET(VERBOSE) THEN PRINT, 'VEGETATION_TIMESERIES_PLOTS: SOLAR ZENITH OUTPUT AT ',OUTPUT_IMAGE WRITE_JPEG,OUTPUT_IMAGE,TEMP,TRUE=1,QUALITY=100 ERASE ;----------------------------------------------- ; RETURN DEVISE WINDOW TO NOMINAL SETTING IF KEYWORD_SET(VERBOSE) THEN PRINT, 'VEGETATION_TIMESERIES_PLOTS: RESETTING DEVICE WINDOW PROPERTIES' IF KEYWORD_SET(NO_ZBUFF) THEN WDELETE SET_PLOT, MACHINE_WINDOW RETURN,1 END
